thread_title: Server Stats - An open Source Bot

messages.raw_content:
🎯 What is Server Stats ?

Server Stats Bot is a free, open-source, and fully automated Discord bot that displays live server metrics in voice channels. Whether you manage a gaming community, a development hub, or a support server, this bot gives your members a clear view of your server’s activity — without lifting a finger.

💡 Key Features:

✅ Completely Free – No paywalls, subscriptions, or premium upsells. Everything is yours from day one.
✅ Open Source – Built by the community, for the community. Modify it, contribute to it, or just enjoy it.
✅ Real-Time Updates – Channels auto-update on user join, bot join, role creation, and version changes.
✅ Set It and Forget It – Once installed, the bot handles everything in the background — no commands needed.
✅ Clean Design – Stats are shown in read-only voice channels under a dedicated "Server Stats" category — visible to all, usable by none.

📊 Displays:
- Members: Total number of human users
- Bots: Number of bots in your server
- Roles: Count of all server roles
- Version: Automatically Updated

📦 Get Started:

Setting up the bot is simple and fast. Just head to the GitHub repository and follow the clear instructions:
👉 [Server Stats on GitHub](https://github.com/Pontikaki34/Server-Stats-Discord-Bot)

🔧 Make It Your Own:

Want to tweak how it works? Go ahead! The code is yours to explore and customize. Whether you're an admin looking to brand your server or a developer who wants to expand the features — Server Stats  gives you the freedom to build.

This powerful bot is your all-in-one solution for a thriving Discord server! 🚀

Here's how it elevates your community:

🎮 Games & Fun: Keep members entertained with built-in activities and engaging experiences.

🛡️ Moderation: Maintain a clean, organized, and positive environment with robust management tools.

🔒 Anti-Nuke Features: Offering a higher level of security than the average bot, this feature requires the bot to be placed in a higher role within your server's hierarchy. This crucial placement enables it to actively defend against "nuke" attempts by kicking or banning malicious bots/users and protecting your community.

It's the ultimate tool for a fun, safe, and resilient Discord community! ✨
# [Link To Invite](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=1395479887309045922&permissions=8&integration_type=0&scope=bot+applications.commands)

**Synz ModMail Bot** – Modern, Private Support for Your Discord Community

Empower your server with a professional ModMail system, making support easy, private, and efficient for both users and staff.

✨ **Features:**
* Secure, private modmail sessions between users and staff
* Slash command support for easy configuration and management
* Button and modal interactions for a modern Discord experience
* Persistent session tracking and planned transcript saving
* Customizable embeds and logging for a professional look

**Made by:** [Synz](https://synz.xyz/)

**Required Permissions:**
* Manage Channels
* Manage Roles
* Send Messages
* Read Message History
* Embed Links

**Note:**  
This is an open-source ModMail bot designed to be self-hosted and used in a single Discord guild (server).  
No public hosting or invite link is provided.

**🌐 GitHub:** https://github.com/LeSynz/modmail-bot

thread_title: Ticket Bot - An Open Source Easy to Use Discord Bot

messages.raw_content:
🎟️ What is Ticket Bot?

Ticket Bot is a free, open-source, and fully customizable Discord bot designed to help you easily manage support tickets within your server. Whether you're running a gaming community, offering customer support, or managing applications, Ticket Bot provides a simple and effective solution for organizing and responding to user inquiries.

💡 Key Features:
Completely Free – No hidden fees, subscriptions, or premium versions.

Open Source – Built for the community. You can view, modify, and contribute to the source code.

Easy to Customize – From ticket categories to embed messages, Ticket Bot is simple to tweak for your server’s needs.

Quick Setup – All installation and configuration steps are clearly documented on the GitHub repository.

📦 Get Started:
Setting up the bot is quick and painless. Just head over to the official repository and follow the step-by-step guide:
👉 [Ticket Bot on GitHub](https://github.com/Pontikaki34/Ticket-Bot-Discord)

🔧 Make It Your Own:
You’re encouraged to clone, modify, and build upon this project. Whether you're a developer looking to improve functionality or a server admin wanting to tailor the bot to your community, the code is yours to explore.

thread_title: Better bot- all your server needs

messages.raw_content:
🤖✨ Meet **Bettter Bot** – The Ultimate All-in-One Discord Bot!

Packed with every feature you can imagine — and even some you didn’t know you needed.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

🧭 **Server Growth**
• Bump system  
• Global ad relay to promote your server across the network

• Smart detection and auto-response

🔧 **Moderation Tools**
• Invite blockers  
• Phrase filtering  
• Built-in verifier system

🎯 **Engagement Boosters**

thread_title: Dad Jokes — The Bot That’s Legally Required to Embarrass You

messages.raw_content:
Need a laugh? Or a groan? Or a dramatic eye-roll from your whole server?

**Dad Jokes** delivers randomly generated dad jokes so bad, they’re kinda good.
Perfect icebreaker for awkward silences and dead VC energy.

✨ **Features:**
* Mention the bot and it responds with the joke
* Random dad joke
* No setup needed

**Made by:** Me

**Required Permissions:**
* Read Message history
* Send Messages

**🔗 Invite Authorization link:** https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=961365558148861974&permissions=67584&integration_type=0&scope=bot
